00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"

00009 StringList split(char on, string line) {
00010         StringList r;
00011         string token = "";
00012         for(int i = 0; i < line.length(); ++i) {
00013                 if(line[i] == on) {
00014                         r.push(token);
00015                         token = "";
00016                 } else token += line[i];
00017         }
00018         r.push(token);
00019         return r;
00020 }
00021 
00022 StringList split(string delimiters, string str) {
00023         StringList r;
00024         
00025     string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00026     string::size_type pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00027         
00028     while(string::npos != pos || string::npos != lastPos) {
00029         r.push(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00030         lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00031         pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00032     }
00033         
00034         return r;
00035 }
